ç¤ºä¾‹

let arr = [15, 18, 35, 51, 42, 33, 36, 25]
let result = arr.every((ele, index, arr) => {
    return ele >= 15
})
console.log(result)// true
-----
let arrObj = [
    {
        name:1,
        isDone:true
    },
    {
        name:2,
        isDone:false
    },
    {
        name:3,
        isDone:true
	}
]
let result = arr.every((ele, index, arr) => {
    return ele.isDone
})
console.log(result)// false
